summary.span: 提供 对象的强类型集合。

span.span: Provides a strongly typed collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一个包含计数器的所有实例数据的集合。The class represents a collection containing all the instance data for a counter. 此集合包含在时使用方法。This collection is contained in the when using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示特定的实例数据本地计算机上。The following code example displays the instance data for a particular on the local computer. 它首先显示的编号的列表名称。It first displays a numbered list of names. 用户输入的一个类别数后，此示例将获取该。After the user enters the number of one of the categories, the example gets the for that . 它然后将返回的集合转换为指向数组对象。It then converts the collection returned by to an array of objects. 此示例还显示与每个关联的实例数据每个。The example also displays the instance data associated with each of each . remarks.format: ## Remarks `instanceName`参数不区分大小写。The `instanceName` parameter is case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例接受类别名称、 计数器名称和实例名称，从命令行。The following code example accepts a category name, counter name, and instance name from the command line. 它获取为类别，这是一套对象。It gets the for the category, which is a collection of objects. 它获取特定于为指定的计数器。From that it gets the particular for the specified counter. 然后，它使用方法来确定是否指定的实例存在，使用默认单实例名称，如果输入任何内容。It then uses the method to determine if the specified instance exists, using the default single-instance name if none is entered. MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.ICollection Keys { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.ICollection Keys
Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对象和与该实例数据关联的对象的计数器注册表项。

span.span: Gets the object and counter registry keys for the objects associated with this instance data.

value.span: 表示一组对象特定的注册表项的 。

span.span: An that represents a set of object-specific registry keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当它已安装并且将计数器数据，并在执行时，每个软件组件创建其对象和计数器的密钥。Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing. 你可以访问此数据，如像访问任何其他注册表数据。You can access this data as you would access any other registry data. 但是，您可以使用注册表收集性能数据，但注册表数据库中不存储数据。However, although you use the registry to collect performance data, the data is not stored in the registry database. 相反，系统从相应的系统对象管理器收集的数据。Instead, the system collects the data from the appropriate system object managers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性返回一个集合的实例名，它将转换为数组的。The following code example uses the property of an to return a collection of instance names, which it converts to an array of . 它将生成的数组对象使用属性。It generates an array of objects using the property. 对于实例名称的数组中每个元素，它显示的名称并调用一个函数来处理关联对象。For each element in the array of instance names, it displays the name and calls a function to process the associated object. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#3)]

span.span: Gets the raw counter values that comprise the instance data for the counter.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示计数器的原始数据值。

span.span: An that represents the counter's raw data values.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性返回的集合对象，它将转换为数组。The following code example uses the property of an to return a collection of objects, which it converts to an array. 它会生成使用的实例名称的数组属性。It generates an array of instance names using the property. 每个元素的数组中对象，它将显示关联的实例名称并调用一个函数来处理对象。For each element in the array of objects, it displays the associated instance name and calls a function to process the object.
